console L the Amazon S3 console and then

restrict assess
to choose the permission
tab scroll down to the bucket policy
session and then choose
addit now add a policy to deny all https
requests let use TRS versions earlier L
1.2 remember to replace the doc example
bucket with your actual bucket name this
policy infor https to increase security
for your data in
transit if your workload requires HTTP
traffic to the S3 bucket L use the
following
policy this policy allows HTTP traffic
by blocks https traffic from TRS
versions earlier L
1.2 so now you know how to enforce TRS
